description: Visit Srimangal, the tea capital known as tea camellia, green carpet or tea mountain covered by a lot of tea estates including the largest one in the world. Explore the terraced tea garden, pineapple, rubber and lemon plantations from a beautiful landscape and make an adventure on the last remaining tropical rainforest Lawacharra, the small tract of dense forests is heaven.

Visit all 7 Shaktipeeth Temples of Bangladesh located in 6 divisions and other famous Hindu ruins & Temples including Puthia. Enjoy the famous 150 years old Rocket Paddle Steamer ride, Experience Floating Market in Barisal, Hike on Chandranath Hill in Chittagong & Tea gardens Sylhet, experience Jamdani Weaving Village and explore riverain Bangladesh in single tour

Explore the Sundarbans, the largest mangrove forest in the world & UNESCO World Heritage Site, intersected by a complex network of tidal waterways, mudflats and small islands. It’s known for its wide range of fauna, including 270 species of the bird, estuarine crocodiles, reptiles & mammals, spotted deer, clawless otter and the man-eating Royal Bengal tiger.

Enjoy overnight river journey by famous Rocket Paddle Steamer and experience the fishing by otters in Narail. Ride a small country boat with otters and learn the techniques of fishing on the river. Visit the old & new part of Dhaka city and the UNESCO world heritage Sixty Dome Mosque, Khan Jahan Ali Shrine and Nine Domed Mosque in Bagerhat .Visit the destination.

Explore Rangamati, Bandarban & Cox’s Bazaar, three districts in Chittagong division are the popular places in Bangladesh and center of natural beauty. Meet 13 different indigenous people & know their lifestyle, make the cruise on the trans-boundary Sangu river & largest human-made Kaptai Lake, visit popular hill points, waterfalls, the famous Golden temple, King.

Spend your holiday in Cox’s Bazar– the longest natural sea beach in the world and the only coral island in the region called Saint Martin. Visit a fishing port and the fishermen villages to know the lifestyles of fishermen, Ramu Buddhist Temple in Maheshkhali Island. Explore Himchari & Inani sea beaches and the Coral Island Saint Martin. Eat fresh sea fish & spend your leisure.
package: Cox’s Bazar & Saint Martin Tour Bangladesh
